description:
Momo-kun and Kurihara-san go on a hot spring trip with their friends. When Momo-kun gets mixed up with a trio of girls, Kurihara-san sees him surrounded by them at the worst possible time. The girls apologize and make excuses, but Kurihara-san doesn`t seem bothered in the slightest. Unable to conceal his irritation with her, Momo-kun leaves the area. The couple experiences a miscommunication at the hot spring inn. Momo-kun begins to feel his love and Kurihara-san`s love may not be the same thing. Kurihara-san chases after Momo-kun to respond to his direct feelings by confessing everything she feels for him. And when Momo-kun accepts her feelings...
Source: crunchyroll
